name: Fallen, the last light
description:
"Fallen, the last light” is a 2D platformer that aims to combine an immersive gaming experience with mental health awareness.
The game tells the story of Phil, a boy who will find himself imprisoned inside his mind during a coma following an accident. In order to return to the real world he will have to undertake a journey in which he will face his psychological problems in the form of monsters and obstacles that populate this setting between dream and reality.
As events unfold, the secrets of this strange world full of pitfalls will be revealed, mysteriously linked to an old pocket watch whose hands run backwards. To get back to his beloved Sophie, Phil will have to overcome all the adversities created by his mind, retracing some fragments of his damaged memory before the hand reaches zero.
In this journey there will be various characters related to the protagonist's life, but figuring out if this is just yet another deception of his mind will be another challenge for him.
